title.narrative: Management of the Integrated programme for control of Neglected Tropical Diseases in Nigeria

description.narrative: This activity (Management of the Integrated programme for control of Neglected Tropical Diseases in Nigeria) is a component of Nigeria: Tackling Neglected Tropical Diseases through an Integrated Approach reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £14,002,933. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Basic health care, Infectious disease control. , with the following implementing partners: Sightsavers. The start date is 01-04-2013 and the end date is 31-03-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
